Add Classified


Classifieds Administration

column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<style type="text/css">

form.directory{
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	}
	
fieldset.directory{
        margin: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
	padding: 10px 0px 10px 5px;
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	width: 480px;
	}
	
legend.directory{
	padding: 0 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-size: 1.0em;
}

.directoryrow{
	clear: both;
	padding-top: 5px;
        margin: 0 10px;
	}

.directoryLabel{
	line-height: 1.6em;
	text-align: right;
	margin-right: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	float: left;
}
input.formField{
	float: left;
	width: 340px;
	}
	
textarea.directoryfield{
        float: left;
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 340px;
	}

input.formField,textarea.directoryfield{
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}	

.clearfix:after {
        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>

column.name: content
column.value:
Add category in @@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###record###:Sub-Category@@@ under @@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###record###:Name@@@

Fill in the form and press the Add button. Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

Your New Category

Leave blank to enable classified listing.
Otherwise fill in name of sub-category under this entry. (For example Accessories. )

column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<style type="text/css">

form.directory{
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	}
	
fieldset.directory{
        margin: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
	padding: 10px 0px 10px 5px;
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	width: 480px;
	}
	
legend.directory{
	padding: 0 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-size: 1.0em;
}

.directoryrow{
	clear: both;
	padding-top: 5px;
        margin: 0 10px;
	}

.directoryLabel{
	line-height: 1.6em;
	text-align: right;
	margin-right: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	float: left;
}
input.formField{
	float: left;
	width: 340px;
	}
	
textarea.directoryfield{
        float: left;
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 340px;
	}

input.formField,textarea.directoryfield{
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}

        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>

column.name: content
column.value:
Add Top Level Classified Category

Fill in the form and press the Add button.

Your New Top Level Classified Category

Leave blank to enable classified listing.
Otherwise fill in name of sub-category under this entry. (For example "Accessories".)

column.value:
Top@@@list:database=@@@import:directory@@@:entry=14:id=0@@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###node###:Parent@@@@@@: @@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###node###:Name@@@

Otherwise fill in name of sub-category under this entry. (For example "Accessories".)

column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" href="/webadmin/jscalendar/skins/aqua/theme.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/calendar.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/lang/calendar-en.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/calendar-setup.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<style type="text/css">

form.directory{
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	}
	
fieldset.directory{
        margin: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
	padding: 10px 0px 10px 5px;
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	width: 480px;
	}
	
legend.directory{
	padding: 0 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-size: 1.0em;
}

.directoryrow{
	clear: both;
	padding-top: 5px;
        margin: 0 10px;
	}

.directoryLabel{
	line-height: 1.6em;
	text-align: right;
	margin-right: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	float: left;
}
input.formField{
	float: left;
	width: 340px;
	}
	
input.dateformField{
	float: left;
	width: 312px;
	}

textarea.directoryfield{
        float: left;
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 340px;
	}

input.formField,textarea.directoryfield{
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}	

.clearfix:after {
        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>

column.value:

column.name: col2
column.value: Items made in an earlier period.

column.name: col2
column.value: George III Longcase Clock from the late 18th century.

column.name: col3
column.value:
A George III Longcase clock in a case of mahognay. The dial is of brass and is decorated with openwork ornaments. The chapter ring is of pewter and the movement with date and seconds.

Signed H. Williams Wootton. Late 18th century.

Height:  85.5 inches

Width: 23.5 inches

Depth: 9 inches
